org.clafer.choco.constraint.propagator

Class PropUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clafer.choco.constraint.propagator.PropUtil

  • public class PropUtil
extends Object
    Various static utility functions for writing Choco propagators.
    Author:
    jimmy

      • domainIntersectEnv

        public static boolean domainIntersectEnv(solver.variables.IntVar ivar,
                         solver.variables.SetVar svar)
        Checks if it is possible for an integer variable to instantiate to a value in the set variable.
        Parameters:
        ivar - the integer variable
        svar - the set variable
        Returns:
        true if and only if (dom(ivar) intersect env(svar)) != empty set, false otherwise

      • domainSubsetEnv

        public static boolean domainSubsetEnv(solver.variables.IntVar ivar,
                      solver.variables.SetVar svar)
        Checks if it is guaranteed that an integer variable instantiates to a value in the set variable.
        Parameters:
        ivar - the integer variable
        svar - the set variable
        Returns:
        true if and only if dom(ivar) subsetof env(svar), false otherwise

      • isSubsetOfEnv

        public static boolean isSubsetOfEnv(gnu.trove.TIntCollection sub,
                    solver.variables.SetVar sup)
        Checks if a collection is contained entirely in a set variable's envelope.
        Parameters:
        sub - the subset
        sup - the superset
        Returns:
        true if and only if sub subsetof env(sup), false otherwise

      • isEnvSubsetEnv

        public static boolean isEnvSubsetEnv(solver.variables.SetVar sub,
                     solver.variables.SetVar sup)
        Checks if a set variable's envelope is contained entirely in another set variable's envelope.
        Parameters:
        sub - the subset
        sup - the superset
        Returns:
        true if and only if env(sub) subsetof env(sup), false otherwise

      • isEnvSubsetEnvs

        public static boolean isEnvSubsetEnvs(solver.variables.SetVar sub,
                      solver.variables.SetVar[] sups)
        Checks if a set variable's envelope is contained entirely in the union of other set variables' envelope.
        Parameters:
        sub - the subset
        sups - the superset union
        Returns:
        true if and only if env(sub) subsetof env(union(sups)), false otherwise

      • isKerSubsetEnv

        public static boolean isKerSubsetEnv(solver.variables.SetVar sub,
                     solver.variables.SetVar sup)
        Checks if a set variable's kernel is contained entirely in another set variable's envelope.
        Parameters:
        sub - the subset
        sup - the superset
        Returns:
        true if and only if ker(sub) subsetof env(sup), false otherwise

        Checks if a set variable's envelope is contained entirely in a collection.
        Parameters:
        sub - the subset
        sup - the superset
        Returns:
        true if and only if ker(sub) subsetof sup, false otherwise

        sup - the superset
